sentences.sentence: He was wielding a large knife.
He was attacked by a man wielding a knife.
sentences.translation: 他遭到一名持刀男子的袭击。

sentences.sentence: Were I a Kuwaiti woman wielding a ballot, I would have been a clearer and more present danger.
sentences.translation: 如果我是一名挥舞着选票的科威特妇女，我就会是一个更清楚和更现实的危险。
